name: New/Updated MySQL Row (PAYMENT-BILL) - Extract Bill from NetSuite
description: When there is a trigger event, do action

code.name: updated_row_v2
code.title: New/updated row in netsuite_1099_payment_bill
code.description: New/updated row in netsuite_1099_payment_bill table in MySQL

block.name: insert_row
block.title: Insert row in netsuite_1099_bill
block.description: Insert row in netsuite_1099_bill table in MySQL
block.comment: Try to insert the BILL record into MySQL

block.name: call_service
block.description: Call recipe Callable - Expense ratio calculation
block.comment: As the Bill was successfully entered, get the bill details and search for all Expenses for this Bill

block.name: search_rows
block.title: Select rows in netsuite_1099_bill
block.description: Select rows in netsuite_1099_bill table in MySQL
block.comment: Search MySQL to get the state of the Bill
Stop this job (nothing else for you to do, the other workato job will update the status once the Bill has been calculated).
IF the state="expenses-search", that means another workato job is currently processing this Bill.
If you get an error because the bill has already been entered into MySQL

block.name: update_rows
block.title: Update rows in netsuite_1099_bill
block.description: Update rows in netsuite_1099_bill table in MySQL
block.comment: Update the state of the Bill to be "expenses-calculated" (make sure to update last_modified to now(3) as well)

code.comment: New/Updated Row from PAYMENT-BILL table where state='bill-search'
